basics.name: Nabil Kadimi
basics.label: WordPress Developer at Codeable
basics.summary: I'm Nabil from Morocco (UTC timezone), I love WordPress, I started using it since Duke (version 2.0, 2006) and I have fun with it almost everyday in my life for the past 5 years, I like it so much that I specialized in it. "w.org" claims I'm a core contrinbutor, a plugin author and a translation contibutor, it should know I'm also a theme author and reviewer.

work.summary: I currently work on WordPress projects on Codeable, the number 1 outsourcing service for WordPress, trusted by Automattic,  PremiumPress and many other big names.
highlights: I worked on more than 120 WordPress projects.
I wrote custom plugins, did websites overhauls, API integrations and more.

work.summary: I enjoy working independently, most of my work is in WordPress, but I also do Drupal, Laravel, advanced JavaScript and much more.
I had the nice opportunity to work with elite Envato author Press Apps.
WordPress plugin development with the awesome Australian startup Fatcat Apps.
highlights: I worked on the plugins Optin Cat & Easy Pricing Tables

work.summary: I was the lead developer in a dream team of web developers and web designers, we made many stunning websites for the Saudi Arabian & the Middle East markets.
highlights: This is where I acquired  my razor sharp CSS/RTL skills as most website were in Arabic.
I worked on many government projects (Ministry of Health and Ministry of Education).
I enjoyed dealing with a major traffic spike when one of the news websites we were managing covered the biggest real estate deal in the history of Saudi Arabia.
I worked in some Drupal projects as well.

work.summary: My debuts were on freelancer websites. Most projects were with WordPress, but I also worked with Drupal, Joomla and vanilla PHP.

courses: Algorhythm, C, C++ and Java Programming

awards.title: Employee of the Month
awards.summary: I won the first "Employee of the Month" title and got an iPad 2 mini which helped me a lot for my cross browser compatibility tests.

skills.name: Other Technologies
keywords: Some C, Ruby, shell scripting & Java.
